project_names.title: Project Names
project_names.description: Project names should look like "vcs-slug/org-name/repo-name" or "repo-name" if slugs as repos is set to true. Only enter "*" for all projects.

project_block_list.title: Project Name Blocklist
project_block_list.description: If project_names is "*", then enter a list of "repo-name" or "vcs-slug/org-name/repo-name"

cutoff_days.title: Cutoff Days
cutoff_days.description: Only fetch data updated after cutoff

reject_unauthorized.title: Enforce Authorized Requests
reject_unauthorized.description: Enable certificate validation for the CircleCI server

request_timeout.title: Request Timeout
request_timeout.description: The max time in milliseconds to wait for a request to complete (0 - no timeout).

max_retries.title: Max Number of Retries
max_retries.description: The max number of retries before giving up on retrying requests to CircleCI API

pull_blocklist_from_graph.title: Pull Projects Blocklist from Faros Graph
pull_blocklist_from_graph.description: Should pull projects blocklist from Faros

uses_github_or_gitlab.title: Uses Github or Gitlab
uses_github_or_gitlab.description: Does the project use Github or Gitlab
